p: Searching for studies in all possible sources of data generates a much larger number of articles than would actually qualify for the established criteria. This is because the search strategy is elaborated by ensuring sensitivity over specificity. Thus, for the screening of studies, the sum of the total number of articles in all databases is recorded and the title is quickly read, allowing the selection of references and discarding a large number of references that do not fall under the eligibility criteria established by the Commission Review [ 7].
